text:
Have you considered making sure NLA is enabled for all workstations – then
create a workstation jumpbox for international users to rdp to that allows them
to then connect from that workstation to whichever server they need access to? 
Cynthia Erno

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Re: RDP NLA Issue
metadata.email_text_original:
Have you considered making sure NLA is enabled for all workstations – then
create a workstation jumpbox for international users to rdp to that allows them
to then connect from that workstation to whichever server they need access to? 
Cynthia Erno 
From: 'Brown, Jeff' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 1, 2024 10:28 AM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Re: RDP NLA Issue 
ATTENTION: This email came from an external source. Do not open attachments or
click on links from unknown senders or unexpected emails. 
Guess I am looking for some troubleshooting suggestions. 
The machines are up-to-date on MS patches, but this has been occurring since at
least December.
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/SA0PR09MB71168C7A12FA50802F4D4A47A5432%40SA0PR09MB7116.namprd09.prod.outlook.com
